changelog: v1.5.5: NSIS installer — proper Windows setup wizard, Start Menu + Desktop shortcuts, Add/Remove Programs, uninstaller. Fixes SmartScreen block on raw .exe downloads.
changes: NEW: NSIS installer (KAM_Sentinel_Setup.exe) — installs to Program Files, creates Start Menu + Desktop shortcuts, registers in Add/Remove Programs, includes uninstaller
NEW: scripts/installer.nsi — NSIS script, version passed dynamically via /DVER= flag
FIX: Windows SmartScreen — installer EXE from a known URL is treated as more trusted than raw PyInstaller binary
UPD: docs/index.html Windows download button now points to KAM_Sentinel_Setup.exe
UPD: version.json windows URL updated to Setup installer; windows_raw kept for advanced users
UPD: deploy.yml builds installer after PyInstaller, uploads both to GitHub Release
